Uses of Class
harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TCardFormat

    • Uses of TCardFormat in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

      Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that return TCardFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TCardFormat TCardFormatter.getCardFormat()
      Return the format currently configured fir this TCardFormat object
      TCardFormat TFileFormatter.getUsedFormat()  
      static TCardFormat TCardFormat.valueOf​(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static TCardFormat[] TCardFormat.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib with parameters of type TCardFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String TCardFormatter.cardToString​(TCard card, int cardId, int cardSetId, TCardFormat format, boolean jollyOn)
      TODO(1.1) Write comment here This method has been added in a second moment to support SQL files.
      String TCardFormatter.cardToString​(TCard card, TCardFormat format, boolean jollyOn)
      Convert a TCard object in a textual representation contained in a string. Several format are supported, see TCardFormat values for further information. If the card is participating in a Tombola game, matched numbers are highlighted using asterisks of, for the jolly number, exclamation marks.
      void TCardFormatter.changeCardFormat​(TCardFormat format)
      Allows the change of the format chose to initialize this TCardFormatter object, letting it to be reused to serialize cards in different format.
      TSeriesList TFileFormatter.readSeriesFile​(String fileName, TCardFormat format)
      This method reads a list of series of cards from a file previously created using TFileFormatter.writeSeriesFile(String, TSeriesList, TCardFormat, OpenOption) companion method on this class.It returns a TSeriesList object ready to be managed by all other TombolaLib classes and methods.
      void TFileFormatter.setUsedFormat​(TCardFormat format)  
      TCard TCardFormatter.stringToCard​(String cardString, TCardFormat format)
      Convert a string representing a tombola card (see TCardFormatter.cardToString(TCard)) into a TCard object, NOT considering information related to a Tombola game (i.e. extracted numbers matched on the card). The TCard object is returned as it has just created by a constructor. The input string must be in the TCardFormat passed as second parameter.
      int TFileFormatter.writeSeriesFile​(String fileName, TSeriesList cardSet, TCardFormat format, OpenOption options)
      This is the most versatile method available in tombolalib to stream a set of series of cards to a file.
      Constructors in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib with parameters of type TCardFormat 
      Constructor Description
      TCardFormatter​(TCardFormat format)
      Constructor for a TCardFormat object, allowing to specify just the format to be used use to serialize cards in strings.
      TCardFormatter​(TCardFormat format, boolean useJolly)
      Constructor for a TCardFormat object, allowing to specify the format to be used use to serialize cards in strings and if jollyIndex values must be used or not.
      TCardFormatter​(TCardFormat format, boolean useJolly, String csvDelimiter)
      Constructor for a TCardFormat object, allowing to specify the format to be used use to serialize cards in strings, if jollyIndex values must be used or not, which delimiter to use between numbers (default: ";").
      TCardFormatter​(TCardFormat format, boolean useJolly, String csvDelimiter, String textDelimiter)
      This is the most versatile constructor for a TCardFormat object. It allows to specify the format to use to serialize cards in strings, if jollyIndex values must be used or not, which delimiter to use between numbers (default: ";") and which delimiter to use to enclose text fields like card labels (default: """).
      TFileFormatter​(TCardFormat format)  
      TFileFormatter​(TCardFormat format, boolean useJolly)  
      TFileFormatter​(TCardFormat format, boolean useJolly, boolean useHeader, boolean skipComments)  
      TFileFormatter​(TCardFormat format, boolean useJolly, boolean useHeader, boolean skipComments, String csvDelimiter, String commentPrefix)
